thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Jeff Antonius

author: Jeff Antonius
title: Jeff Antonius
text:
I have two homes and Flologic has saved us at. We used to rent a few years ago. FloLogic went off when an illegal rental tenant turned on the water. FL was in the "away" mode. They called OUR management company asking why there was no water. That led to the police visiting.
As it turned out, the Rental company got caught renting our place one extra day without our knowledge; hence they would have picked up the entire rental for one day vs a commision only on that extra day.
